text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا
translation: Ahubwo none, burya boba bafise umugabane w’ubwami bahawe! Abari aho, iyo bahabwa umugabane w’ubwami, ntibari kugira n’umwe mu bantu baha akantu ide kangana n’agahere kari ku mugongo w’urutete rw’itende [92].
